string_data: This image shows the famous Trevi Fountain in Rome with a large orange banner reading "NON PAGHIAMO FOSSILE!" (We don't pay for fossil fuels) displayed in the water. Several people can be seen around the fountain's base near the protest banner. The baroque fountain features its iconic sculptural elements including Neptune's chariot and Triton figures, set against the ornate Palazzo Poli facade under a blue sky with white clouds.
